    • Method Detail

      • combineArrays

        public static Character[] combineArrays(Character[] arr1,
                                        Character[] arr2)
        Join the given arrays, maintaining order where arr1 comes before arr2.
        Parameters:
        arr1 - a Character array to join
        arr2 - a Character array to join
        Returns:
        null if both arrays are null, or a copy of arr1+arr2. If only one array is null, the other array is copied only

      • isSame

        public static final boolean isSame(Character c,
                                   String s)
        An aid to filtering, isSame returns true if a given Character exactly matches a given String in size (1) and content
        Parameters:
        c - a character to test against
        s - a string to compare to the character
        Returns:
        true if the string describes the character exactly

      • slashEscapeChar

        public static final String slashEscapeChar(Character c)
        Converts given character to it's escaped version
        Parameters:
        c - a character to possibly escape
        Returns:
        a slash-escaped version of the character, if necessary

        Returns:

        public static final boolean isAlphaNum(char c)
        Checks to see if a character is alphanumeric
        Parameters:
        c - a character to check against
        Returns:
        true if the character is in the set of lowercase, uppercase, or numeric characters, false otherwise

        Returns:
